title: This Account is Stolen
body: Hello, I am the actual owner of this account. It was stolen from me but I am still logged on from my computer. Is there anyway I can regain access to this account? It also appears to be unverified still. The person just changed the password!

replies.body: Go over to the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) page as soon as you can and update your password and email.  If you have any issues with recovery, reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We'll help out individually through there.
